rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: She is very willing to give outside help and loves it when it visit her office hours to discuss the material. A very good communicator and wonderful, knowledgable professor

She is so inspiring, one of the most wonderful professors I've had. She is so invested and knowledgable about the material, and is really interested in our thoughts and opinions. She works are to help us formulate ideas and gain a thorough understanding.
Very challenging class but if you do your work and she knows you're trying hard you'll be fine. You'll finish al-Kitaab 2.

A generally decent teacher. A good amount of reading and short written responses, but covers everything thoroughly in class and encourages a lot of discussion. Midterm and final are both take-home essays.
